plot: Feel the thrill, as you experience the elation of gliding atop the waves with Shelly Fitzpatrick for the first surf of the season. You see, hear and feel the rush, with a dramatic sunset over the Pacific as the panoramic background.
title: Feel the Thrill
plot_es: Feel the thrill, as you experience the elation of gliding atop the waves with Shelly Fitzpatrick for the first surf of the season. You see, hear and feel the rush, with a dramatic sunset over the Pacific as the panoramic background.
plot_en: Feel the thrill, as you experience the elation of gliding atop the waves with Shelly Fitzpatrick for the first surf of the season. You see, hear and feel the rush, with a dramatic sunset over the Pacific as the panoramic background.
